SEARCH

Class LibrarianControllerTest

java.lang.Object
LibrarianControllerTest
public class LibrarianControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive Test Suite for the LibrarianController class.

This suite focuses on achieving maximum code coverage by testing private helper methods via Reflection, verifying transaction flows, and handling edge cases in data parsing.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

    • initToolkit

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the controller and cleans files before each test.
      Throws:
      Exception - if initialization fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources after each test.

    • testPrivateParsers

      @Test void testPrivateParsers() throws Exception
      Tests private parsing helper methods using Reflection. Validates `parseIntSafe`, `parseDoubleSafe`, `getPart`, and `extractBorrowedBy` to ensure robustness against malformed data.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection access fails.

    • testInitializeFull

      @Test void testInitializeFull() throws Exception
      Tests the full initialization process, including file loading and column setup.
      Throws:
      Exception - if file creation or reflection injection fails.

    • testBorrowReturnFlow

      @Test void testBorrowReturnFlow() throws Exception
      Simulates a complete Borrow and Return transaction cycle. Verifies that the item status updates correctly in the backend list.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection invocation fails.
